title: 第 12 集 自行车！| Bicycles!

data.zh: 今天是个阳光灿烂的日子，
data.en: It is a lovely, sunny day,

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治在骑自行车。
data.en: and Peppa and George are riding their bicycles.

data.zh: 这真是一个很不错的南瓜，猪爸爸！
data.en: That's a fine pumpkin, Daddy Pig!

data.zh: 猪爸爸对他的南瓜感到很自豪。
data.en: Daddy Pig is very proud of his pumpkin.

data.zh: 南瓜是我唯一能种的东西。
data.en: Pumpkins are the only thing I can grow.

data.zh: 这可能是因为我喜欢吃南瓜派吧！
data.en: Probably because I love pumpkin pie!
Come on, George.
Danny, Suzy, Rebecca!
Peppa and her friends,

data.zh: 小狗丹尼，小羊苏茜和小兔瑞贝卡在骑自行车。
data.en: Danny Dog, Suzy Sheep and Rebecca Rabbit are riding their bicycles.
George is riding his tricycle.
He's going so slowly.

data.zh: 让我们来比赛，看谁先到达猪爸爸的南瓜那里。
data.en: Let's race to Daddy Pig's pumpkin.

data.zh: 如果我们要骑到爸爸的南瓜那里，
data.en: If we race to Daddy's Pumpkin,

data.zh: 我们得非常小心，千万别撞上去。
data.en: we have to be very careful not to bump into it.

data.zh: 如果南瓜撞坏了，爸爸会非常伤心的。
data.en: Daddy would be very sad if the pumpkin got broken.
Don't worry, Peppa..
Race you!

data.zh: 佩奇和她的朋友比赛谁先到达南瓜！
data.en: Peppa and her friends are racing to Daddy Pig's pumpkin!
Hey! Watch out for my pumpkin!!
Hurray!

data.zh: 佩奇！小心点！ 爸爸的南瓜啊！！！！
data.en: Peppa! Look out! Daddy's Pumpkin!!!!
Sorry, Daddy!
Look at George! He's going so slowly!

data.zh: 乔治现在还骑着儿童自行车呢！
data.en: George is still riding a baby bike!

data.zh: 你的也是儿童自行车，佩奇！
data.en: Yours is a baby bike, too, Peppa!

data.zh: 你的车子两旁还有辅助轮！
data.en: You've still got stabilizers!

data.zh: 我骑的自行车可没有辅助轮的。
data.en: I can ride without my stabilizers.
Me, too.
And me.
Let's ride up the hill again!
Are you coming, Peppa?

data.zh: 不了，我想我要呆在这里。
data.en: No, I think I'll stay here.
See you later! Bye!

data.zh: 佩奇希望她的自行车上没有辅助轮。
data.en: Peppa wishes she did not have stabilizers on her bicycle.

data.zh: 爸爸，我不想再有辅助轮了。
data.en: Daddy, I don't want stabilizers anymore.
Do you think you can ride without them?
Yes.

data.zh: 那好吧，佩奇。我们把辅助轮卸掉。
data.en: Alright, Peppa. Let's take them off.

data.zh: 猪爸爸把辅助轮从佩奇的自行车上卸掉。
data.en: Daddy Pig is taking the stabilizers off Peppa's bicycle.

data.zh: 你确信没有辅助轮你能骑吗？
data.en: Are you sure you want to ride without stabilizers?
Yes!
You've never done it before.

data.zh: 我可以做到的。我可以！我可以！
data.en: I can do it. I can! I can!
Arrgh!
It's not funny!

data.zh: 没有辅助轮的自行车一点也不容易骑。
data.en: Riding without stabilizers is not easy.
Would you like some help, Peppa?
Yes, please, Daddy.
Alright. Ready...
Steady... GO!
Don't let go, Daddy!

data.zh: 不用担心，我会抓紧你的。
data.en: Don't worry. I've got you.
You're doing really well, Peppa.
Hold on, Daddy!
Just keep peddling.

data.zh: 佩奇能自己骑自行车，不需要辅助轮了！
data.en: Peppa is riding on her own, without stabilizers!
Daddy! You let go!

data.zh: 你已经一个人骑了很久了。
data.en: You've been cycling on your own for ages.
Have I?
You're really very good at it!
Am I?
Oh, I can do it! Look at me!

data.zh: 看看我！我能自己骑两轮自行车了。
data.en: Look at me! I can ride my bike properly.
Danny! Suzy! Rebecca! Look!

data.zh: 我不再需要辅助轮了！看我！
data.en: I don't need my stabilizers anymore! Look at me!
Hurray!

data.zh: 比赛骑到爸爸的南瓜那里！
data.en: Race you to Daddy's pumpkin!
Wheeeee!
Peppa, look out my pumpkin!
I'm going to win!
Peppa isn't looking where she is going!
Wahhhh! Oops!

data.zh: 哦,糟糕了，佩奇把猪爸爸的南瓜撞碎了！
data.en: Oh, dear, Peppa has squashed Daddy Pig's pumpkin!

data.zh: 对不起，爸爸，我把南瓜撞碎了。
data.en: Sorry I squashed your pumpkin, Daddy.
Never mind the pumpkin.

data.zh: 重要的是你没有受伤就好了。
data.en: The important thing is that you are okay.
In future, you really must look where you are going.

data.zh: 我保证我以后会的，爸爸。
data.en: I promise I will, Daddy.

data.zh: 好吧。既然现在南瓜都已经碎了，
data.en: Good. Anyway, now the pumpkin is broken,

data.zh: 我们就用它来做南瓜派吧！
data.en: I can make it into pumpkin pie!
I love pumpkin pie!

data.zh: 因为猪爸爸的南瓜很大，
data.en: And because Daddy Pig's pumpkin is so big,

data.zh: 所以我们每个人都可以吃到南瓜派了！
data.en: there will be enough pumpkin pie for everyone!
Hurray!
